#summary Gmock development roadmap

== ~~Version 0.1~~ ==

  * Basic mocking functionnality

== ~~Version 0.2~~ ==

  * Rename raises and returns (~~[http://code.google.com/p/gmock/issues/detail?id=3 issue-3]~~)
  * Refactor constructor mocking (~~[http://code.google.com/p/gmock/issues/detail?id=6 issue-6]~~)
  * Introduce GMockController (~~[http://code.google.com/p/gmock/issues/detail?id=5 issue-5]~~)
  * Refactor stub return (~~[http://code.google.com/p/gmock/issues/detail?id=11 issue-11]~~)

== Version 0.3 ==

  * Property mocking ([http://code.google.com/p/gmock/issues/detail?id=7 issue-7])
  * Static method mocking ([http://code.google.com/p/gmock/issues/detail?id=8 issue-8])
  * Improvement of the raise method ([http://code.google.com/p/gmock/issues/detail?id=10 issue-10])

== Version 0.4 ==

  * Closure matcher ([http://code.google.com/p/gmock/issues/detail?id=12 issue-12])

== Version 0.5 ==

  * Multiple call definition (atLeast, more...)
  * Arguments matcher, both closure matcher and hamcrest matcher
